article: Jane is a good English teacher in M. T. School.The students like her and her  _  very much.Now,summer is coming.The weather is very  _  .The students are often sleepy ,and don't like to listen to  _  classes. "  _  can I make the students listen to my classes?"Jane asks herself.One day,she  _  some riddles in a book."It can be a  _  way.The students may like to answer riddles."Jane thinks. Next afternoon,she asks a riddle  _  class,"It has got two hands and a face,  _  no feet.What is it?" The students are happy about the riddle.One of the students  stands up  and says,"It's a clock ." "Yes,you're  _  ."Jane says.She's happy that the students are not sleepy now.
